info.author: luiz.yao
info.description:
====
douban
====
douban is a django app to collect movie's short comments in douban.com.

Quick start
-----------

1. Add "douban" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

        INSTALLED_APPS = (
                ...
                'douban',
        )

2. Set database configuration in your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

        'default': {
                'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.mysql',
                'NAME': '', # database name
                'USER': '', # username
                'PASSWORD': '', # password
                'HOST': '127.0.0.1',
                'PORT': '3306', # default listen port
                'OPTIONS': {
                        'init_command': "SET sql_mode='STRICT_TRANS_TABLES'",
                        # the default charset used by django to connect db is 'utf-8'
                        # change to 'utf8mb4' is recommended, otherwise some data like emoji faces cannot save
                        'charset': 'utf8mb4',
                },
        }        

3. Include the polls URLconf in your project urls.py like this::

        from django.urls import include
        from django.conf.urls import url

        url(r'^douban/', include('douban.urls'))

4. Run `python3 manage.py makemigrations douban` and `python3 manage.py migrate` to create the douban models.

5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/douban/ to participate it.
info.name: django-scrapy-douban
info.summary: A simple Django app to collect and display movie's short comments from douban.com.
info.html_description:
====
douban
====
douban is a django app to collect movie's short comments in douban.com.

Quick start
-----------

1. Add "douban" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

INSTALLED_APPS = (
...
'douban',
)

2. Set database configuration in your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

'default': {
'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.mysql',
'NAME': '', # database name
'USER': '', # username
'PASSWORD': '', # password
'HOST': '127.0.0.1',
'PORT': '3306', # default listen port
'OPTIONS': {
'init_command': "SET sql_mode='STRICT_TRANS_TABLES'",
# the default charset used by django to connect db is 'utf-8'
# change to 'utf8mb4' is recommended, otherwise some data like emoji faces cannot save
'charset': 'utf8mb4',
},
}

3. Include the polls URLconf in your project urls.py like this::

from django.urls import include
from django.conf.urls import url

url(r'^douban/', include('douban.urls'))

4. Run `python3 manage.py makemigrations douban` and `python3 manage.py migrate` to create the douban models.

5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/douban/ to participate it.
